summary: Diff largely implements a 6-section single-page AI ebook landing page with consistent WhatsApp CTA link and updated tech-style palette, but some text/copy requirements cannot be verified as exact, required static image assets are not shown as added, and there are unrequested edits to constrained/legacy components (including an immutable-path hook).

missing_requirements.requirement: All user-facing text matches the user-provided headings/subheadings/reviews/disclaimer verbatim (except where wording was left open-ended).
missing_requirements.reason: Some visible headings/text in the diff do not match the specified section naming and/or are likely placeholders; exact user-provided review text/bullets are not reflected as-is.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement the “Why Choose This Guide?” section with the exact title and bullet points provided by the user.
missing_requirements.reason: While the title matches, the bullet list appears author-generated and includes content not specified in the BuildRequest summary (e.g., delivery claim). Cannot confirm it matches the user-provided bullets verbatim.

missing_requirements.requirement: Social Proof / Reviews section contains exactly 3 short reviews using the exact text provided by the user (including the star symbol).
missing_requirements.reason: Component displays 3 reviews, but the strings appear to be newly written and the star handling removes the leading star from the rendered text (`review.substring(2)`), so the displayed review text likely does not match the required verbatim strings.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the required generated images as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and render them in the page.
missing_requirements.reason: Components reference the required image paths, but the diff summary does not show the actual image files being added under `frontend/public/assets/generated`.

hallucinated_features.description: Edited an immutable-path file (Internet Identity hook), despite constraint to not edit files under frontend/immutablePaths.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly forbids editing immutable paths; diff shows modifications to `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed copy claiming "Instant PDF delivery via WhatsApp" in benefits.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goals explicitly state no automated PDF delivery; this benefit implies delivery behavior that may contradict the requested positioning (manual delivery after payment).

hallucinated_features.description: Modified legacy Cake King sections (Contact/Gallery/Services/Hero) even though the new landing page composes different components.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on replacing the homepage with the new 6-section landing page; modifying unused/legacy sections is not requested and increases risk of leaving old WhatsApp text elsewhere.
